content: Hello! Welcome to your antenatal visit. May I please have your full name, including both first and last names, to begin filling out your ANC visit form?
Thank you, Gita. Could you please provide your full name, including your last name? This helps us keep your records accurate.
Thank you, Gita Prasad. Could you please share your full address, including the specific place where you live?

Thank you for sharing part of your address. Could you please provide your full address, including house number or flat number, street name, and locality? This will help ensure your records are complete.
Flat 302, Sri Venkateshwara Nilaya, near Hanuman Temple, Indiranagar.
Thank you. Could you please provide your 10-digit telephone number? This helps us contact you if needed.
Thank you for sharing your number.  Could you please provide your complete 10-digit telephone number?  The number you gave seems to be incomplete.
